__e: Riley, I need to know who both the killer and the correspondent are, and I need to know that now.
And, Riley, I don't know if I've ever said this before...

Because from where I'm standing, Riley, there's nothing to tell.
Yeah, yeah, because it's not like Riley has anything better to do.
But weren't you also just saying that Riley can't get along without me?
You will keep an eye on Riley at all times.
Unfortunately, we can't ask Riley. Her condition is the same.
Riley, what did I ever do to you, huh, to make you just assume - the worst about me all the time?

I mean - - I mean Riley is my best friend, but I'm not, you know -- you know.

I swear, Riley is everywhere I go and she still barely talks to me.
